title.rendered: Argos Home Extending Table & 6 Button Chairs – Grey

excerpt.rendered:
Upgrade your dining game with the Argos Home Miami Extending Table & 6 Button Chairs in Grey! Picture this: a sleek grey finish that’s not just stylish but also a mood-lifter. The extending table is like a magic trick, transforming from cozy dinners to big bash-ready in a snap. And those six-button chairs? Pure comfort and a dash of class. Whether it’s a chill family dinner or a full-blown fiesta, this set’s got your back. Sturdy, chic, and always ready for a good time, the Argos Home Miami set turns your dining room into the heart of happy gatherings. Cheers to good food, great company, and awesome furniture! 🍽️✨

product details:

Table:

  • Extended Table size (H30 inches, W42 inches, L 66 inches)
    Width: 3.5 fit
    Length 5.5fit
    Height: 2.5fit
  • Simple Table size (H30 inches, W42 inches, L 60 inches)
    Width: 3.5 fit
    Length 5.0fit
    Height: 2.5fit
  • Wood effect table with wood effect legs.
  • table top High Gloss finish.
  • Self-assembly – 2 people recommended.

Chair:

  • Includes 6 chairs.
  • Size of each chair H40 inches, W22inches , D22 inches
  • Seat height 20 inches.
  • Solid wood frame with solid wood legs.
  • Fabric seat Juth.
  • Pre Assembled
  • The maximum user weight per chair is 130kg.

“Note: all our products are made to order.”
